dt-event.name: filter
dt-event.summary: Filter event - fired when the table is filtered.
dt-event.description:
The `dt-event filter` event is fired whenever the table's filtering is triggered by the global search or columns search options, including calls from the API (`dt-api search()` for example). Additionally, a full redraw (by calling the `dt-api draw()`) method will cause the table to be re-filtered.
Note that the `dt-event filter` will be fired before the table has been redrawn with the updated filtered data, although the data will internally have been filtered.
